name: Void Rift
description: A tear in reality where the laws of physics break down. Only the strongest dare enter.
image_prompt_positive: Abstract landscape, floating rocks, purple and black swirling portal, stars, cosmic horror, surreal, dreamlike
image_prompt_negative: normal world, ground, sky, buildings, trees
narrative: Physics dissolves at the edge of the Void Rift. It is a tear in the fabric of reality, a swirling vortex of purple and black energy that hovers in a null-gravity field. Debris from the material world floats into it and disintegrates, while alien geometries seep out. Those who approach report a sensation of falling while standing still, and the whispers here are not from the past, but from entities that have never known existence in our universe.

points_of_interest.name: The Edge of Reality
points_of_interest.description: Where the ground simply ends and dissolves into the void.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Cliff edge, dissolving into space, stars, purple nebula

points_of_interest.name: Floating Islands
points_of_interest.description: Chunks of land defying gravity, connected by magical tethers.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Floating rocks, purple sky, magical bridges

points_of_interest.name: The Swirling Vortex
points_of_interest.description: The center of the rift, a terrifying maelstrom of raw energy.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Black hole, energy swirl, destruction, cosmic horror
